record.dc:title: 60BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 6BN82 and 6BN83. 6BN82 is a child in foreground. Stratum II bottom or Stratum IV top. 6BN83 is adult in background. Stratum II bottom or Stratum IV top. Square 50R2. Direction Northwest.
record.wpa:narrative: [6BN82] Indeterminate child in fair condition. Fully flexed on right side, face down and SE, head oriented to east. Burial is fragmentary. [6BN83] Indeterminate adult in good condition. Fully flexed on face, arms at side and arms folded, hands at chin, legs beneath. Burial is fragmentary. Burial 82 and 83 are at the junction of Stratum II and Stratum IV. Stratum III is not present. Unusual deposit.
